This property verifies that the mux_opb signal is correctly assigned when specific conditions occur. 

The property triggers on every positive edge of the gclk clock, unless the active-high grst signal is asserted. When wOPC[3] equals 1 and opb_fwd equals 0, the property requires that mux_opb must equal the concatenation of wOPC[3] and opb_fwd, which forms the 2-bit value {1, 0}.
